item.title: .Net Core
item.description: Official guides # Build web APIs with .NET 8.0 Tutorial - Controllers .NET 8.0 Tutorial: Minimal API .NET 8.0 Action return types .NET 8.0 Sample Projects # .NET 8.0 gamestoolkit.api (Clean Architecture / Dapper / EFCore / CQRS / AutoMapper / Swagger / Functional testing / Unit testing / CI) .NET Core 2.2 AspCore.SampleAPI (Clean Architecture / Domain / Behaviors / Queries / AutoMapper / Swagger / Functional testing / CI) Vortex # Write elegant and testeable solutions on C# using a Monadic Framework.
